mapper.insert: insert into shoporder(order_seq, order_id, order_balance, order_price, order_payment, product_id, user_id, order_date, shipment_address, shipment_zipcode, order_invoice) values (order_seq.nextval, #{order_id}, #{order_balance}, #{order_price}, #{order_payment}, #{product_id}, #{user_id}, sysdate, #{shipment_address}, #{shipment_zipcode}, #{order_invoice})
